attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With families and businesses struggling more and more with covering costs why does the government not scrap all existing taxes and replace with a simple turnover tax system. This would be easy to amdinister, hard to defraud and simple for everyone to understand. We worked out the figures on this and found that to raise the finances needed to run the services would amount to a simple 20% turnover taxation rate. Simple, clear and easy to understand....maybe politicians like confusion, most businesses and the general public don't.....Just imagine a life without, TV Licence, Council Tax, Road Tax, Inheritance Tax, VAT etc etc...
